channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13493] Fix TransactionBatchImpl.getCurrentTxnId() and mis logging fixes
item.description:
sort list of transaction IDs deleted by performTimeouts
sort list of "empty aborted"
log the list of lock id removed due to timeout

fix TransactionBatchImpl.getCurrentTxnId() not to look past end of array (see HIVE-13489)
beginNextTransactionImpl()
if ( currentTxnIndex >= txnIds.size() )//todo: this condition is bogus should check currentTxnIndex + 1
item.summary: Fix TransactionBatchImpl.getCurrentTxnId() and mis logging fixes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Wei Zheng could you review please
